officialTitle: Multicentric Randomized Controlled Study to Determine a Tailored Strategy for Controlled Ovarian Stimulation in IVF Based on AMH, BMI and AFC
inclusionCriteria:
* female infertile patients eligible for IVF treatment
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 43 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* polycystic ovaries
* untreated thyroid pathology
* hypogonadotropic hypogonadism
* untreaed hyperprolactinemia
* study drug hypersensitivity
* previous OHSS
* unilateral ovariectomy
* genital malformation
* BMI\>40
